statements: SELECT * FROM user_interactions;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, timestamp FROM user_interactions WHERE location='New York';
SELECT ad_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE device_type='Mobile' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id FROM user_interactions WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND device_type='Desktop';
SELECT user_id, ad_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT ad_id, timestamp, location, device_type FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE device_type IN ('Mobile', 'Tablet') AND location LIKE '%USA%' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT interaction_type, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM user_interactions GROUP BY interaction_type ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT timestamp, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM user_interactions GROUP BY timestamp HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT ad_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 3 AND ad_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM ad_targeting_algorithms WHERE algorithm_id = 5;
SELECT algorithm_name, description FROM ad_targeting_algorithms WHERE algorithm_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT ad_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE ad_id = 101 AND interaction_type <> 'view' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT algorithm_name, description FROM ad_targeting_algorithms WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_interactions, AVG(user_id) AS avg_user_id FROM user_interactions GROUP BY ad_id ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions;
SELECT user_id, ad_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT ad_id, ad_title, ad_category FROM ad_content ORDER BY ad_rating DESC;
SELECT user_id, ad_id, targeting_score FROM ad_targeting WHERE targeting_score > 0.5;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_interactions
SELECT ad_title, ad_description, ad_rating FROM ad_content WHERE ad_rating > 4.5
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC
SELECT ad_title, ad_description, ad_category FROM ad_content WHERE ad_category = 'Technology'
SELECT A.ad_title, A.ad_description, B.targeting_score FROM ad_content A JOIN ad_targeting B ON A.ad_id = B.ad_id WHERE B.targeting_score > 0.8 ORDER BY B.targeting_score DESC
SELECT * FROM UserInteractions;
SELECT interaction_id, user_id, interaction_type FROM UserInteractions WHERE interaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_name, user_age, user_location FROM Users WHERE user_age >= 30 ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT ad_name, ad_target_group FROM Ads WHERE ad_type = 'Digital' ORDER BY ad_name DESC;
SELECT ad_id, targeting_metric, metric_value FROM AdTargetingMetrics WHERE metric_value > 0.5 AND targeting_metric LIKE '%gender%' ORDER BY ad_id;
SELECT * FROM UserInteractions;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM UserInteractions WHERE ad_id = 3;
SELECT user_name, user_age, user_location FROM Users WHERE user_age > 25 ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT ad_name, ad_type, ad_target_group FROM Ads WHERE ad_type = 'Social Media' ORDER BY ad_name DESC;
SELECT ad_id, targeting_metric, metric_value FROM AdTargetingMetrics WHERE metric_value > 0.5 ORDER BY ad_id, metric_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_interaction;
SELECT user_id, interaction_timestamp FROM user_interaction WHERE interaction_type = 'click';
SELECT ad_id, target_audience FROM ad_targeting ORDER BY ad_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, impression_timestamp FROM ad_impressions WHERE user_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678';
SELECT ad_id, COUNT(*) AS total_clicks FROM ad_clicks GROUP BY ad_id ORDER BY total_clicks DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_interaction ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM user_interaction WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT ad_id, target_audience FROM ad_targeting WHERE target_audience = 'Young Adults' ORDER BY ad_id;
SELECT ad_id, user_id, impression_timestamp FROM ad_impressions WHERE impression_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT ad_id, user_id, click_timestamp FROM ad_clicks WHERE user_id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001');
